LabelText: Record details of brute force indicators (failed login spikes, lockouts, source IPs)
Identify targeted accounts or systems (VPN, web portal, SSH, RDP)
Block or rate-limit offending IPs or networks at firewall/WAF/VPN gateway
Review authentication logs to confirm no unauthorized logins succeeded
Force password reset for targeted accounts if compromise is suspected
Ensure MFA is enforced for remote access and critical systems
Tune lockout thresholds, CAPTCHA, and throttling to reduce attack impact
Document attack pattern, defenses applied, and any follow-up actions
